short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate subtitles & download the courses on Domestika, Udemy, 21Draw and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps you translate subtitles into more languages on e-learning platforms like Domestika, Udemy, 21draw.
The course download feature only works on Domestika.
